website_summaries.verdict: An economical graphite set with options for women of all heights.
pros: Ideal for beginners as these clubs are light, flexible, and should not restrict those learning new form
Especially useful for those who are 5 foot 3 inches and shorter
cons: Doesn't include all available club sizes

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with these clubs
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these clubs. I'm a novice golfer and will use this set basically for lessons and driving/ practice range. The club set is light so I don't have a problem picking them up and walking around with them. Not every size club is included but quite enough to play on any course. I have a slow swing so the graphite shafts work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: sealionb

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for a new golfer!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for a great price! I am a new golfer and needed a decent set of clubs for my lessons and practice. These were perfect. The bag is nice and the complete set of clubs gives me the opportunity to practice thoroughly. Quality seems good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vander Baan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Clubs - Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner golfer so didn't want to commit a lot of money to a first set. These exceeded expectations in every way. Nice stand bag with plenty of pockets which seems sturdy, and the clubs got a thumbs up approval from my instructor.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beginner set
customer_reviews.text: I got these and instantly went to the driving range. My shot is a lot better than it was 20 years ago. I stopped playing because I had very old used clubs. These are for a petite person, and I am 5'1 and light. I think I will enjoy golf now :)
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Maley

customer_reviews.title: Complete set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner golf set for women. Light weight and has all the golf clubs I need to start with. It only has 2 irons: 6/7 and a 7/8. I don’t think it matters much for a beginner and maybe later 4 or 7 separate irons are needed : 4 thru 9. I have only used the 7/8 iron because we needed a 7 iron for class. We are practicing using the pitching wedge and putter right now. Price is great too, $199! I’m glad to have a bag which covers the clubs and have club covers too. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: clutter19

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking set for the money. I'm glad I found a set for women that isn't the standard pink or purple. I've only tried them once because it's hotter than hell here right now. Loved the feel!
customer_reviews.author: Dana C. Privette

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this March 2020, and played less than a handful of times before the pandemic shut down for 2 months and the iron 6/7 already falling out. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Some club lengths seem to short. My height is 5'3". Have used them on the driving range and they work good. The bag is very good. It has some separate compartments for holding the clubs and many zippered pockets. To knew in golfing to state more.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Estvander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! The petit size is perfect for me under 5'3.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value & Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My husband golfs and my son is getting into it. I didn’t want to spend a ton of money until I could confirm we are definitely golfing and I’ve enjoyed hitting practice balls with these. Sturdy and even my husband commented on the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Now that I purchased clubs that “fit” ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Now that I purchased clubs that “fit” my shorter stature I play much better!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ferdelman

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great clubs!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying these clubs. The price for the number of clubs and a bag is incredible. I am particularly pleased I could get them in a petite size.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is perfect for me at 5'2". Easy to carry strap and rain cover!
customer_reviews.author: LindaW

customer_reviews.title: Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these clubs. I am an inexperienced golfer but these work perfect for me. They were in great condition being used clubs. I cant even tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are a great starter set. I'm 5 feet so I took the petite set. It's very lightweight and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these clubs!!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged really nice , beautiful clubs! Very happy with my first set and will definitely buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Noseworthy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice starter set.
customer_reviews.text: She hasn’t used it yet but it seems perfect for her size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of clubs!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was very happy with the golf club set.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Nowell

customer_reviews.title: Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Im new to golf and these were recommended to me. I was using my husbands clubs and what a difference having the right clubs for your height. Plus they are so much lighter. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Light weight very important
customer_reviews.text: Golf set looks great she hasn’t had a chance to use them yet. Shipping was great came in 2days
customer_reviews.author: william

product_meta.title: Precise NX460 Ladies Womens Complete Golf Clubs Set Includes Driver, Fairway, Hybrid, 4 Irons, Putter, Bag, 3 H/C's - 2 Sizes - Regular and Petite Size!
product_meta.description: This Precise NX460 ladies golf set is designed to get you on the course. Includes all the clubs you need to get started, and isn't too heavy to carry around. Uses all premium lightweight materials without sacrificing any performance! Available in standard size and petite size for ladies 5'3" and below.
feature_bullets: Includes Driver, Fairway Wood, Hybrid, 6/7, 8/9, PW, SW Irons, Putter, Stand Bag, 3 H/C's
Great Lightweight Starter Set Includes everything to get on the course!
Ultra Light High Modulus 100% Graphite Shaft for all clubs!
Matching Deluxe Dual-Strap Golf Bag and Headcovers! Carry your bag like a backpack!
Two Sizes Available - Standard 5'3" - 5'9" and Petite Size 5'3" and Below!
